episode.title: Measure Seven Times, Cut Once
episode.rawTitle: 366: ‘Measure Seven Times, Cut Once’, With Glenn Fleishman
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Glenn Fleishman returns to the show to talk about reported setbacks in Apple's silicon division, the LastPass vault leak and password management, and the frontiers of social networking. Also, the joys of modern air travel during the holidays.
